data.title: Globalstar SmartOne Solar Satellite GPS Tracker
data.meta_description: The Globalstar SmartOne Solar GPS asset tracking device is ideal for unpowered marine assets in remote locations and inhospitable environments. It has a 10-year battery life and is configured using Bluetooth or a web interface. Reports location data in 4 modes with Geo-fencing, stationary or when in motion reporting.
data.text:
Globalstar SmartOne Solar-Powered GPS Satellite Tracker

By employing SmartOne Solar, your company can streamline M2M operations and monitor and manage remote assets.

SmartOne Solar is the next-generation GPS tracker in Globalstar's industry-acclaimed SmartOne satellite tracker product line. Operating on one of the world's most modern and fastest satellite networks and powered by the sun, this IoT device provides excellent remote monitoring and tracking capabilities.

SmartOne Solar's NiMH rechargeable batteries deliver up to 10 years of life, drastically reducing maintenance time and the cost of labour and parts. They also let users intelligently configure reporting times and intervals for custom information delivery.

It has also achieved unparalleled safety and device certifications, including ATEX Class I Zone 0: Division 1, CSA22.2, UL60079-0, IP69K, HERO certifications, and others, to meet the needs of every application. Let SmartOne Solar streamline your M2M operations today.

SmartOne Solar allows you to proactively manage remote assets through automated data collection and critical monitoring.

A solar-powered device with up to 8 years of battery life and no requirement for external power or antennas

Control costs with affordable and scalable satellite service plans

Improves operational productivity through reliable remote asset performance monitoring, safety and compliance, smart metering, and data visibility

Trouble-free management for personnel responsible for assets with autonomous and efficient device operation

Additional options for control over message delivery with geofencing capabilities

SmartOne Solar Asset Tracker includes:

12 different reporting times

Interval or 24-hour operation mode

Alternate reporting schedules

Low battery message

Motion Sensor/Vibration parameter and scheduling

Contact closure parameters

Diagnostic messages

Include Speed and Heading data in reported motion messages.

Features

Solar-powered with up to 10 years of battery life

Intrinsically Safe

Bluetooth interface for easy configuration

GPS Location reporting in 4 modes

Geo-fencing with configurable range

Stationary or in-motion reporting

Reduced messaging & theft recovery modes

Receives and transmits data from external sensors

Two dry-contact or wetted-voltage inputs are available to manage engine run time, tank level or various alarm inputs.

Quick and easy installation requires no harnesses, external power, or external antennas.
